data.name: AdultRTF
data.value: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 CMR10;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 CMTI10;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2508;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs20 The purpose of this form is to document that consent was obtained from a person over 18 years of age to participate in a research study. \par \i\f1\par \b Title of Research Study\b0 : \i0\f0 World-wide Collaboration to Empower People with Disabilities to Improve Assistive Interfaces.\par \par \b\i\f1 Investigator\b0 : \i0\f0 Margrit Betke, Ph.D., Email: \ul betke@cs.bu.edu\ulnone\par \par \b\i\f1 Purpose\b0 : \i0\f0 The objective of this project is to help people with severe disabilities gain access to a computer and thereby obtain a tool for communication. \par \par If you agree to participate in this research project, the following things will happen:\par \par \pard{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-720\li720 We will collect information about natural usage of the Camera Mouse Suites by sending text messages to our computer.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}You do not need to perform any explicit experiments or testing procedures for us. The messages will be sent automatically in the background.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}You can select the level of information sent to us, from sending no messages to sending information about mouse pointer movements, clicking events, current Camera Mouse settings, and training data. No images are sent.\par \pard\par \b\i\f1 Confidentiality\b0 : \i0\f0 All data obtained in this research project will be considered confidential. It will be used for research purposes only. Access to the digital data will be restricted. \par \par \b\i\f1 Benefits\b0 : \i0\f0 Participation in this study introduces you to a new computer tool for communication and education. The logging messages sent to us from your system will help us improve the Camera Mouse Suite system. With your help, our system will become easier to use by people with movement disabilities.\par \par \b\i\f1 Expected Duration\b0 : \i0\f0 The data collection will occur as long as you are enrolled in our research study.\par \par \b\i\f1 Risks\b0 : \i0 There are no additional risks in participating in the research study beyond normal usage of the Camera Mouse Suite software. \f0\par \par \b\i\f1 Questions\b0 : \i0\f0 The researcher has provided information to you about this study and has offered to answer your questions. If you have any questions about your rights as a participant in a research study, contact the Coordinator of the Institutional Review Board, Boston University, at 617-358-6115.\par \par \b\i\f1 Right to Refuse or Withdraw\b0 : \i0\f0 Your participation in the research study is entirely voluntary. You may use the Camera Mouse Suite without participation in the research study. You are free to refuse to take part or withdraw at any time. There is no penalty for withdrawal.\par }

data.name: ChildRTF
data.value: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 CMR10;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 CMTI10;}{\f2\fswiss\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2508;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs20 The purpose of this form is to document that consent was obtained from a person between the ages of 7 and 18 to participate in a research study. If the minor cannot read this form, it must be read to him or her.\par \i\f1\par \b Title of Research Study\b0 : \i0\f0 World-wide Collaboration to Empower People with Disabilities to Improve Assistive Interfaces.\par \par \par \b\i\f1 Investigator\b0 : \i0\f0 Margrit Betke, Ph.D., Email: \ul betke@cs.bu.edu\ulnone\par \par \b\i\f1 Purpose\b0 : \i0\f0 The objective of this project is to help people with severe disabilities gain access to a computer and thereby obtain a tool for communication. The project collects information on the computer and sends it to the makers of the program.\par \par If you agree to participate in this research project, the following things will happen:\par \par \pard{\pntext\f3\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf3\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-720\li720 We will collect information about the Camera Mouse by sending messages to our computer.\par {\pntext\f3\'B7\tab}You do not need to perform any experiments for us.\par {\pntext\f3\'B7\tab}You can select the level of information sent to us, from sending no messages to sending information such as where the mouse pointer is and when you click it.\par \pard\par \b\i\f1 Confidentiality\b0 : \i0\f0 All information and video data obtained in this research project will be considered confidential. It will be used for research purposes only. Access to the digital data will be restricted.\par \par \b\i\f1 Benefits\b0 : \i0\f0 Participation in this study introduces you to a new computer tool for communication and education. You will help improve a mouse replacement system used by people worldwide. With your help, our system will become easier to use by people with movement disabilities.\par \par \b\i\f1 Expected Duration\b0 : \i0\f0 The data collection will occur as long as you are enrolled in our research study.\i\f1\par \i0\f0\par \b\i\f1 Questions\b0 : \i0\f0 The researcher has provided information to you about this study and has offered to answer your questions. If you have any questions about your rights as a participant in a research study, contact the Coordinator of the Institutional Review Board, Boston University, at 617-358-6115.\par \par \b\i\f1 Right to Refuse or Withdraw\b0 : \i0\f0 Your participation in the research study is entirely voluntary. You may use the Camera Mouse without participation in the research study. You are free to refuse to take part or withdraw at any time. There is no penalty for withdrawal.\par \par \f2\par }

data.name: ParentRTF
data.value: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 CMR10;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 CMTI10;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2508;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs20 The purpose of this form is to document that consent was obtained from a parent or guardian of a minor to participate in a research study. \par \i\f1\par \b Title of Research Study\b0 : \i0\f0 World-wide Collaboration to Empower People with Disabilities to Improve Assistive Interfaces.\par \par \b\i\f1 Investigator\b0 : \i0\f0 Margrit Betke, Ph.D., Email: \ul betke@cs.bu.edu\ulnone\par \par \b\i\f1 Purpose\b0 : \i0\f0 The objective of this project is to help people with severe disabilities gain access to a computer and thereby obtain a tool for communication. \par \par If you agree for your child or ward to participate in this research project, the following things will happen:\par \par \pard{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-720\li720 We will collect information about natural usage of the Camera Mousby sending text messages to our computer.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Your child/ward does not need to perform any explicit experiments or testing procedures for us. The messages will be sent automatically in the background.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}You can select the level of information sent to us, from sending no messages to sending information about mouse pointer movements, clicking events, current Camera Mouse settings, and training data. No images are sent.\par \pard\par \b\i\f1 Confidentiality\b0 : \i0\f0 All data obtained in this research project will be considered confidential. It will be used for research purposes only. Access to the digital data will be restricted. \par \par \b\i\f1 Benefits\b0 : \i0\f0 Participation in this study introduces your child/ward to a new computer tool for communication and education. Your child/ward will help improve a mouse replacement system used by people worldwide. With your help, our system will become easier to use by people with movement disabilities.\par \par \b\i\f1 Expected Duration\b0 : \i0\f0 The data collection will occur as long as you are enrolled in our research study.\par \par \b\i\f1 Risks\b0 : \i0 There are no additional risks in participating in the research study beyond normal usage of the Camera Mouse Suite software. \f0\par \par \b\i\f1 Questions\b0 : \i0\f0 The researcher has provided information to you about this study and has offered to answer your questions. If you have any questions about your rights as a participant in a research study, contact the Coordinator of the Institutional Review Board, Boston University, at 617-358-6115.\par \par \b\i\f1 Right to Refuse or Withdraw\b0 : \i0\f0 The participation of your child/ward in the research study is entirely voluntary. He or she may use the Camera Mouse Suite without participation in the research study. You and your child/ward are free to refuse to take part or withdraw at any time. There is no penalty for withdrawal.\par }
